abstract: The biotechnology company said its anemia drug Aranesp increased the risk of death when used to treat certain cancer patients.
snippet: The biotechnology company said its anemia drug Aranesp increased the risk of death when used to treat certain cancer patients.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Jan. 25  Amgen, the biotechnology company, said Thursday that its anemia drug Aranesp increased the risk of death when used to treat certain cancer patients, a finding that will probably raise more questions about it and similar drugs.

headline.main: Amgen Finds Anemia Drug Holds Risks in Cancer Use
headline.print_headline: Amgen Finds Anemia Drug Holds Risks In Cancer Use
